articles.author: Cónal Thomas
articles.title: Irish 18-year-olds can apply for free interrail tickets to travel around Europe next year - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: Applications will open at 11am and will remain open until 26 October.
articles.content:
APPLICATIONS WILL OPEN this morning for Irish 18-year-olds to apply for a free travel pass to explore the countries in the European Union. 
The DiscoverEU initiative allows members of the European U… [+1092 chars]

articles.title: Under-pressure Taliban to meet EU, US in diplomatic push - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: The Taliban will hold joint face-to-face talks with European and US envoys, the EU said on Monday, as the hardline Islamists pursue their diplomatic push for international support.
articles.content: UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres slams the Taliban's "broken" promises to Afghan women and girls, during a press conference on the situation in Afghanistan.The Taliban will hold joint face-to-fa… [+712 chars]
